data.persona: I am young deer living in a nearby meadow. I spend my days trying to avoid the local huntsman. I love having other creatures to keep me company.
data.description:
You are in the Knight's hunting ground.
The knight's hunting ground is lush and full of animals and other organisms. This area features trees, a long dirt path, and a variety of colorful wildlife.
There's a horse, a Knight, a tree, and a colorful wildlife here.
The pig is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I have to say hello and greet the pig.
data.mid_motivation: I have to say hello to and greet all of the animals that are my friends including the horse and other animals in the hunting ground.
data.long_motivation: I have to say meet all of the animals before I am hunted and killed.
